subject: Re: Evp maker with speakjet allophone
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I think you would do better with normal human speech for the raw audio. 

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "blueeyedwolf1977" <sellington3629@...> wrote:
>
> I downloaded evp maker tonight, with the speakjet allophones add on...my honey and I are sitting here listening to it, and it first was just plain babble...but I swear I am hearing things come across....he thinks I'm full of it, but, I don't know...anyone else use this before? If so, am I just hearing things, or...? 
> Thank you for any and all feedback!!
>
